block.p: Dina Marie Farruggio was married last evening to Juan Carlos Castrillon. The Rev. Patrick E. Trujillo, a priest of the Old Catholic Church, officiated aboard the Lady Windridge, a motor yacht, at Chelsea Piers in New York.

Mrs. Castrillon, 30, is a guidance counselor at Rye Middle School in Rye, N.Y. She graduated from Iona College and received a master's degree in psychology from Long Island University. She is a daughter of Theresa Fowler of Hawthorne, N.Y., and a stepdaughter of David Fowler, who retired as a police officer in Mount Pleasant, N.Y. Her mother retired as a purchasing manager for TSSI, a computer maintenance company in Ossining, N.Y.

Dina Marie Farruggio was married last evening to Juan Carlos Castrillon. The Rev. Patrick E. Trujillo, a priest of the Old Catholic Church, officiated aboard the Lady Windridge, a motor yacht, at Chelsea Piers in New York.

Mrs. Castrillon, 30, is a guidance counselor at Rye Middle School in Rye, N.Y. She graduated from Iona College and received a master's degree in psychology from Long Island University. She is a daughter of Theresa Fowler of Hawthorne, N.Y., and a stepdaughter of David Fowler, who retired as a police officer in Mount Pleasant, N.Y. Her mother retired as a purchasing manager for TSSI, a computer maintenance company in Ossining, N.Y.

Mr. Castrillon, 32, is a senior analyst at Goldman, Sachs & Company, the New York investment bank, and a volunteer mentor to students at Intermediate School 131 in New York. He graduated from the State University College at Old Westbury, N.Y. He is a son of Norela and Luis Castrillon of Hicksville, N.Y. His mother is a supervisor at E-Z-EM, a medical equipment manufacturer in Westbury, N.Y. His father, who is retired, was a chef at the North Shore Steak House in Great Neck, N.Y.
